com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.calendar
Class Calendar

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite
              com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.AbstractBoundWidget
                  com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.calendar.Calendar
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesChangeEvents, Bindable, Introspectable, SourcesPropertyChangeEvents, KeyBoundWidget, BoundWidget, Renderers, SourcesCalendarDrawEvents, SourcesCalendarEvents
public class Calendar
extends AbstractBoundWidget
implements Renderers, SourcesCalendarEvents, SourcesCalendarDrawEvents

This BoundWidget renders a Calendar on the screen, and supports a value property of Date.

Author:
cooper
